items.sentence: Tom knows better than to do that without asking for permission first.
Tom said he wanted to move to Boston because that's where Mary lives.
This isn't the first time that we've seen something like this happen.
If today was your last day on this earth, what would you want to eat?
Tom was really surprised when Mary told him that she didn't like him.
Tom is still driving that old truck that he got from his grandfather.
Do you remember when I made you laugh? We had so much fun, didn't we?
This village is one of the most beautiful places that I've ever been.
I think it's dangerous to climb a mountain on a day when it's stormy.
This nation's economy is growing by leaps and bounds in recent years.
